candidates.name: Tab Sweeper for Work Sessions
candidates.description: A Chrome extension that auto-groups and hibernates tabs by project with one-click restore. Shows a weekly 'time saved' dashboard.
candidates.wedge: Unlike OneTab's messy lists, we auto-group by project and show time-saved stats that make the habit stick.

voc_quotes.quote: My tabs get out of control and kill my focus
I want something simple that just sleeps tabs automatically
Most tab managers feel like a project to set up

candidates.name: Screenshot Annotator & Sharer
candidates.description: Capture, annotate, and share screenshots with one click. Auto-uploads to a shareable link, no account required for viewers.
candidates.wedge: Unlike Loom's video-first approach, we're screenshot-first with instant annotation and a shareable link in 2 clicks.
mvp_in: One-click full page or selection capture

voc_quotes.quote: I just want to share a quick screenshot without signing up for anything
Loom is too much when I just need to show one screen
Why do all screenshot tools require the viewer to log in?

candidates.name: Price Drop Alert Extension
candidates.description: Track prices on any product page. Get email alerts when prices drop. See price history charts before you buy.
candidates.wedge: Unlike Honey's coupon focus, we show price history charts and email you only when prices actually drop.
mvp_in: Works on Amazon, Walmart, Target, Best Buy

voc_quotes.quote: I wish I knew if this price is actually a deal or just normal
Honey never actually saves me money, just tracks cookies
I want to track prices across multiple stores not just Amazon

candidates.name: CSV Cleaner for Imports
candidates.description: Upload messy CSVs, fix common issues (dates, currency, duplicates), download clean files ready for QuickBooks/Shopify/Sheets.
candidates.audience: small business owners, bookkeepers, ops assistants
candidates.wedge: Unlike complex ETL tools, we're a one-purpose 'make this import work' tool with templates for popular destinations.
mvp_in: Templates for QuickBooks, Shopify, Google Sheets

competitors.name: Parabola
competitors.gap: Way too complex for simple fixes

voc_quotes.quote: I keep getting import errors and don't know what's wrong with my CSV
I just want a tool that tells me what to fix and lets me download a clean file
I only need this once in a while, not a monthly subscription

candidates.name: Instant Dashboard from Spreadsheet
candidates.description: Paste a Google Sheets or Excel link, get a beautiful dashboard with charts. Share with clients or embed on your site.
candidates.wedge: Unlike Tableau's learning curve, paste a spreadsheet link and get a shareable dashboard in 60 seconds.
mvp_in: Paste Google Sheets link to import

voc_quotes.quote: My clients want to see charts but I don't have time to learn Tableau
I just want to turn my spreadsheet into something I can show in a meeting
Google Data Studio is free but takes forever to set up

candidates.name: Form Builder with Sheet Backend
candidates.description: Create forms that save responses directly to Google Sheets. Embed anywhere, no database required.
candidates.wedge: Unlike Typeform's pricing, we're $5/mo unlimited forms with native Google Sheets sync.

voc_quotes.quote: Typeform is beautiful but I can't justify $25/mo for a contact form
I want form responses in a spreadsheet not some dashboard I'll never check
Google Forms works but looks terrible on my site

candidates.name: Instant Quote Widget for Services
candidates.description: Embed a quote calculator on your website. Visitors get instant ballpark pricing, you get their contact info via SMS.
candidates.audience: local service businesses (junk removal, cleaning, landscaping)
candidates.wedge: Unlike complex quote builders, setup takes 10 minutes and leads come via SMS for faster response.

voc_quotes.quote: People ask for prices and never fill out my contact form
If I could text them a quote instantly I'd book more jobs
I don't want a full CRM, just a simple estimator widget

candidates.name: Review Collector for Local Business
candidates.description: Send customers a link after service. Happy ones go to Google Reviews, unhappy ones go to private feedback.
candidates.wedge: Unlike review platforms, we filter before posting—happy customers to Google, complaints to you privately.

voc_quotes.quote: I need more Google reviews but don't want to pay $300/mo for Podium
I wish unhappy customers told me before posting a 1-star review
I just want a simple link to send after each job

candidates.name: Simple Booking Link for Services
candidates.description: Create a booking page in 5 minutes. Customers pick a time, you get notified. Syncs with Google Calendar.
candidates.wedge: Unlike Calendly's feature bloat, we're booking-only with zero setup friction and a free forever tier.

voc_quotes.quote: Calendly is overkill for my personal training business
I just need a link where clients can pick a time slot
Why do all booking tools try to sell me a CRM?

candidates.name: Expense Tracker with Receipt Snap
candidates.description: Snap a photo of any receipt. We extract the amount, date, and category. Export to CSV for tax time.
candidates.audience: freelancers, small business owners, gig workers
candidates.wedge: Unlike Expensify's enterprise complexity, snap and done—no approval workflows or corporate features.

voc_quotes.quote: I just need to track receipts for tax deductions, nothing else
Expensify is for corporations, I'm one person
I lose receipts and panic at tax time every year

candidates.name: Subscription Tracker & Cancellation Reminders
candidates.description: List all your subscriptions in one place. Get reminders before free trials end or annual renewals hit.
candidates.wedge: Unlike Truebill's bank-linking requirement, manually add subscriptions and get reminder-only—no upsells.

voc_quotes.quote: I forgot to cancel a free trial and got charged for a year
I don't want to link my bank account to anything
I have no idea how much I spend on subscriptions each month

candidates.name: Simple Invoice Generator
candidates.description: Create professional invoices in 2 minutes. Send via email or download PDF. Track paid/unpaid status.
candidates.wedge: Unlike FreshBooks' monthly fee, pay per invoice or use free tier forever for basic needs.

voc_quotes.quote: I only invoice a few clients a month, FreshBooks is too expensive
I just want to make a PDF invoice and email it
Wave is free but I have to sign up for a whole accounting system

candidates.name: Focus Timer with Site Blocker
candidates.description: Start a focus session, block distracting sites, get stats on your deep work hours.
candidates.wedge: Unlike Forest's gamification, we're stats-focused—see your actual deep work hours per week.

voc_quotes.quote: I need to see how many hours of real focus I get each week
Forest is cute but I want data, not trees
I always unblock sites 5 minutes into a session

candidates.name: Meeting Cost Calculator
candidates.description: Show the real-time cost of a meeting based on attendees. Chrome extension overlays on Google Meet/Zoom.
candidates.wedge: Unlike meeting-free advocacy, we show the dollar cost in real-time to nudge behavior change.

voc_quotes.quote: Nobody realizes a 1-hour meeting with 10 people costs $500+
I want to show my team the cost of our meetings without being preachy
We have too many meetings but no one sees the problem

candidates.name: YouTube Thumbnail Maker
candidates.description: Create click-worthy YouTube thumbnails in 5 minutes. Templates, text effects, and face cutout tools included.
candidates.wedge: Unlike Canva's generic templates, we're YouTube-specific with proven thumbnail formats and face tools.

voc_quotes.quote: Canva templates all look the same, my thumbnails don't stand out
I spend way too long on thumbnails when I should be making videos
I can't afford to pay a designer for every video

candidates.name: Bio Link Page Builder
candidates.description: Create a beautiful link-in-bio page in 5 minutes. Custom themes, analytics, and no Linktree branding.
candidates.wedge: Unlike Linktree's free tier branding, we're $3/mo for unlimited links, custom themes, and no watermark.

voc_quotes.quote: I hate the Linktree watermark but can't justify $5/mo for a link page
Linktree themes all look the same
I just want a simple page with my links, nothing else

candidates.name: Etsy/eBay Listing Optimizer
candidates.description: Paste your listing, get suggestions to improve title, tags, and description for better search ranking.
candidates.wedge: Unlike eRank's data overload, we give 5 specific action items to improve your listing right now.

competitors.name: eRank
competitors.gap: Data dump, no clear action items

voc_quotes.quote: eRank shows me 100 charts but I don't know what to actually change
I need someone to just tell me what's wrong with my listing
My listings get no views and I don't know why

candidates.name: Simple Inventory Tracker
candidates.description: Track inventory across Etsy, eBay, and Poshmark in one spreadsheet-like view. Get low stock alerts.
candidates.wedge: Unlike Sellbrite's enterprise pricing, we're a simple tracker for sellers with <500 items.

voc_quotes.quote: I sold the same item on Etsy and eBay because I forgot to update inventory
Sellbrite is great but $29/mo when I only have 50 items?
I need something between a spreadsheet and a full inventory system

candidates.name: Reseller Profit Calculator
candidates.description: Enter buy price, selling price, and platform. Get true profit after all fees, shipping, and taxes.
candidates.wedge: Unlike generic calculators, we know exact fee structures for Etsy, eBay, Poshmark, and Mercari.
mvp_in: Enter buy price and sell price

voc_quotes.quote: I thought I made profit but forgot about the PayPal fee and shipping
I sell on 3 platforms and each has different fees
I need to know if a thrift find is worth flipping before I buy it

candidates.name: Flashcard Maker from Notes
candidates.description: Paste your notes or PDF, get auto-generated flashcards. Review with spaced repetition.
candidates.wedge: Unlike Anki's manual card creation, paste notes and we generate cards automatically.

voc_quotes.quote: I spend more time making Anki cards than actually studying
I wish I could just paste my notes and get flashcards
Quizlet is easier but doesn't have real spaced repetition

candidates.name: Minimal Habit Tracker
candidates.description: Track daily habits with a simple checkbox grid. See streaks and completion rates. Nothing else.
candidates.wedge: Unlike Habitica's gamification or Notion's complexity, we're just a checkbox grid with streaks.

voc_quotes.quote: I don't want to fight dragons, I just want to check boxes
Every habit app tries to be too clever
I want to see my streak, that's it

candidates.name: Reading List with Progress Tracking
candidates.description: Track books you want to read, are reading, and finished. Log reading sessions and see yearly stats.
candidates.wedge: Unlike Goodreads' social clutter, we're reading-focused with session logging and yearly stats.
mvp_in: Want to read / Reading / Finished shelves

voc_quotes.quote: Goodreads is a social network, I just want to track my reading
I want to see how many pages I read this week
Goodreads UX hasn't been updated since 2010

candidates.name: Weekly Meal Planner with Grocery List
candidates.description: Plan your meals for the week, auto-generate a grocery list. Share with family and check off items as you shop.
candidates.audience: busy families, health-conscious individuals, budget shoppers
candidates.wedge: Unlike complex recipe apps, we're meal-first—plan your week in 5 minutes and get a shareable grocery list.
mvp_in: Add meals by name or recipe URL

competitors.name: Notion templates
competitors.gap: Manual setup, no grocery list sync

voc_quotes.quote: I waste so much time figuring out what to cook each night
I always forget something at the grocery store
I need to share my grocery list with my spouse in real-time

candidates.name: Simple Budget Tracker
candidates.description: Set monthly budgets by category, log expenses, see where your money goes. No bank linking required.
candidates.wedge: Unlike Mint's complexity and ads, we're a simple envelope-style budget with no bank linking.

voc_quotes.quote: I don't want to link my bank account to track spending
YNAB is great but $14/mo is ridiculous
I just want to see if I'm overspending on food this month
